name: space/time
description:
Two steps forward, one step back. Two steps forward, one step back. You got this, Alex.

 

Summary:

space/time is a solo project made over a weekend for Extra Credits's "cycles" jam. Whenever you take damage, you warp back in time a few seconds to try again. If you're a fan of scrolling shooters, fast-paced action, or exactly 2 colors, give this game a shot.

Resources Used:

Music: "Boss Battle #3" by nene

Sound Effects: "512 Sound Effects (8-bit style)" by SubspaceAudio

Controls:
  • [Arrow Keys] - move
  • [Z] - toggle between window sizes
  • [Enter] - start
